00018 class SelectQuery {
00019     bool _distinct;
00020     int _limit, _offset;
00021     Split _results;
00022     Split _sources;
00023     std::string _where; 
00024     Split _groupBy;
00025     std::string _having;
00026     Split _orderBy;
00027 public:
